briefTitle: A Phase III Study Assessing the Safety and Efficacy of DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution Compared With Latanoprost Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With OAG or OHT
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Observer-Masked, Active-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Multinational and Multicenter Study Assessing the Safety and Efficacy of DE-117 Ophthalmic Solution 0.002% Compared With Latanoprost Ophthalmic Solution 0.005% in Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension- PEONY Study
conditions: Open Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the intraocular pressure-lowering effect and the safety of DE-117 ophthalmic solution compared with Latanoprost ophthalmic solution in subjects with open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Month 3 (average of IOP at 3 time points: 09:00, 13:00, 17:00)
